    • withClaim

      public BulkInvoiceItemBuilder withClaim(ValueGenerator<Claim> claimGenerator)
      Links this item to the given claimBuilder, sets the claimBuilder number field and leaves the item info with an empty reserve line wrapper. Use either this method or withReserveLine(ValueGenerator<ReserveLine>), not both.
      Parameters:
      claimGenerator - generates the claim to link to the item
      Returns:
      this builder

    • withClaim

      public BulkInvoiceItemBuilder withClaim(Claim claim)
      Links this item to the given claimBuilder, sets the claimBuilder number field and leaves the item info with an empty reserve line wrapper. Use either this method or withReserveLine(ValueGenerator<ReserveLine>), not both.
      Parameters:
      claim - claim to link to the item
      Returns:
      this builder

    • withReserveLine

      public BulkInvoiceItemBuilder withReserveLine(ValueGenerator<ReserveLine> reserveLineGenerator)
      Links this item and its item info to the given reserve line. Also sets up the claim info and claim number fields from the reserve line's claim. The ReserveLine must have transactions on it, since otherwise, it will be deleted during commit, leaving the ReserveLineWrapper with an invalid reference. Use either this method or withClaim(gw.api.databuilder.ValueGenerator<entity.Claim>), not both.
      Parameters:
      reserveLineGenerator - generator for the reserve line
      Returns:
      this builder

    • withReserveLine

      public BulkInvoiceItemBuilder withReserveLine(ReserveLine reserveLine)
      Links this item and its item info to the given reserve line. Also sets up the claim info and claim number fields from the reserve line's claim. The ReserveLine must have transactions on it, since otherwise, it will be deleted during commit, leaving the ReserveLineWrapper with an invalid reference. Use either this method or withClaim(gw.api.databuilder.ValueGenerator<entity.Claim>), not both.
      Parameters:
      reserveLine - the reserve line
      Returns:
      this builder

    • erodesReserves

      public BulkInvoiceItemBuilder erodesReserves()
      Causes the builder to create this Bulk Invoice Item as one that erodes reserves
      Returns:
      this builder

      this builder
